parameters.content:
## STEP 1 - GOOGLE SHEET
Create a [Google Sheet like this]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}

Please insert:
- in the "IMAGE MODEL" column the basic image of the model to dress

Leave the "3D RESULT" column unfilled. It will be inserted by the system once the image has been created

nodes.name: Sticky Note5

parameters.content:
## STEP 3 - MAIN FLOW
Start the workflow manually or periodically by hooking the "Schedule Trigger" node. It is recommended to set it at 5 minute intervals.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note6

parameters.content:
## STEP 2 - GET API KEY (YOURAPIKEY)
Create an account [here]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }} and obtain API KEY.
In the node "Create Image" set "Header Auth" and set:
- Name: "Authorization"
- Value: "Key YOURAPIKEY"

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Image-to-3D

## Overview
Automated workflow: Image-to-3D. This workflow integrates 10 different services: stickyNote, httpRequest, wait, scheduleTrigger, googleDrive. It contains 28 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 28
- **Node Types**: 10
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **When clicking ‘Test workflow’**: manualTrigger
- **Get status**: httpRequest
- **Wait 60 sec.**: wait
- **Schedule Trigger**: scheduleTrigger
- **Sticky Note3**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note4**: stickyNote
- **Completed?**: if
- **Update result**: googleSheets
- **Set data**: set
- **Sticky Note5**: stickyNote
- ... and 18 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
